RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 79. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EMERY coaxed from the gate, chased four then three wide advancing to latch on the leader midway on the turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, took over command just inside the three-sixteenths and drew clear under a drive to prevail. WASKESIU raced three wide in closest aim of the early leader before advancing to take command near the half mile pole, tucked to the two path at that station and showed the way through the turn coming under pressure to the outside midway, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, got collared just inside the three-sixteenths, proved no match for the top one late while running on to secure the place honors. BEFORE YOU GO GO coaxed from the start, led early on from the two path before being headed half a mile from home, tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths now giving chase, swung four wide for home, ran on to procure the show honors. CLEARLY A TEST away to the front, chased four then three wide down the backstretch and into the turn, came under coaxing tucked to the two path three furlongs from home, took the inside route into upper stretch and kept on to the finish. JUSTICE JULIA chased along the inside until tipped to the three path at the three-eighths, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Justice Julia
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, tip 3w 3/8, coaxed 5/16, angled 5w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Emery
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, up, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Before You Go Go
ENTRY.OWNER: Low, Lawana L. and Robert E.
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, led early 2p, headed 1/2, ins turn, 4w upper, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Clearly a Test
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-3w, coaxed 2p 3/8, inside 1/4, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Waskesiu
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w in aim, up near 1/2, 2p turn, 2w 1/4p, collared, ran on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 79. Maiden Special Weight Purse 83000. (UP TO $14,442 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (For Horses That Sold or RNA for $50,000 Or Less In Their Most Recent Sale). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be runa t Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LESLIE'S LOOT broke out and was bumped lightly in the hindquarters while coming away clearly in front, sped clear then drew off, extended the advantage in the two path on the turn, responded well when asked for her best in upper stretch and maintained a safe advantage under steady urging. TEMPTING LADY chased the solo leader down the backstretch, went around the turn in the three path, pursued the winner in the stretch and finished willingly for the place. SHE SHE'S SHADOW broke in but was very quickly corrected by the rider then hustled, was urged along on the outside, went around the turn in the four path and weakened but held the show. HANDLE ON YOU bumped with a rival at the start and was off a half-step slow, was urged along off the pace, traveled around the turn in the two path and lacked the needed response. ITZA DREAM was bumped just after the start, raced off the pace while ridden along, moved out outside the half-mile pole, went four wide on the turn and came up empty. LUNA ROSSO broke near the back of the field, was urged along on the outside, went six wide on the turn and failed to respond. ALTHENA was urged along off the pace, saved ground on the turn and had nothing left. LU'S REDEMPTION was off slow and spotted the front a few lengths, raced towards the back under urging, went three wide on the turn, angled out in upper stretch and failed to threaten. ROCK ON LAYLA dropped back fast near the five-eighths pole then continued to retreat while climbing badly, moved from the rail to the two path on the turn and was no factor. TURBO MAGGIE bobbled after the start, angled in near the rear early, went two then three wide on the turn and also was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Luna Rosso
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk near back,urged along,6wide turn,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Althena
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along, inside turn, nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Rock On Layla
ENTRY.OWNER: Caputo John Serpico Peter and Flying Zee Racing Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back fast5/8,climbed badly,ins-2p turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Tempting Lady
ENTRY.OWNER: Royal Steed Racing and Scott Ryan C
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace,3path turn,willingly for place

ENTRY.NAME: Lu's Redemption
ENTRY.OWNER: Clear Stars Stable Mitre Box Stable and Big Toe Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, well back, 3path turn, angled out 3/16, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Leslie's Loot
ENTRY.OWNER: Chapman, James K. and Tsujimoto, Stuart
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,bmpd in hindquarterds,in front,drew off,2p turn,respond

ENTRY.NAME: Handle On You
ENTRY.OWNER: Imperio, Michael and Nassau CC Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,off 1/2 step slow,urged,2path turn,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Itza Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped after brk,ridden along,mvd out 1/2,4wide turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: She She's Shadow
ENTRY.OWNER: Englehart Jeffrey S and Photos Finish LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,corrected,chased outside,4path turn,wknd,held show

ENTRY.NAME: Turbo Maggie
ENTRY.OWNER: Rader Norman L and Gardner Edward F
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled after start,angled in,2-3path turn,no factor

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Purse 149500. (PURSE $115,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $26,013 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LITTLE PRANKSTER broke out at the start bumping CUPID'S HEART, ranged up to establish the front and show the way in hand three then two wide through blistering splits, continued two to three wide for home, edged away to the eighth pole, dug in and held safe to prevail kept to task. MONGOLIAN PANTHER chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid but it proved not enough to reel in the top one. CUPID'S HEART got bumped at the start by LITTLE PRANKSTER, who broke outwards, chased five wide getting set down at the quarter pole, offered up a mild bid to secure the show honors. LIQUIDITY PROVIDER chased three then two wide, came under coaxing at the three-eighths along the inside, swung three wide into upper stretch, made no impact. VALLELUJAH coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Vallelujah
ENTRY.OWNER: East Ave Racing Stable and Sisu Racing Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed 7/16, 3w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Liquidity Provider
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed ins 3/8, 3w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Little Prankster
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, in hand 3-2w, 2-3w uppr, edged away, safe

ENTRY.NAME: Cupid's Heart
ENTRY.OWNER: Flying P Stable and R A Hill Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 5w, set down 5w upper, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Mongolian Panther
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, mild bid, not enough

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 101. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 149500. INNER TURF (PURSE $115,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $26,013 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At Any Distance Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At TimeOf Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GILMORE was hustled from the gate, went four to five wide on the first turn, tracked the pace on the outside, rounded the far turn in the four path, made a bid when asked near the five-sixteenths, dueled outside of the runner-up under a left-handed crop in upper stretch, came in some when given one pop of a right-handed crop approaching the sixteenth-pole then was corrected by the rider, had the rider throw exaggerated crosses near his opponent with the left-rein from that point to the finish and narrowly prevailed under strong urging. ANTARES raced in the three path on the first turn, prompted the pace on the outside, took the lead in the two path with three furlongs to run, turned into upper stretch on even terms with the winner, drifted out under a left-handed crop near the furlong marker then switched to a right-handed crop, fought on gamely to the finish and just missed while clear for the place. ASKARI broke out at the start, moved in to save ground on the first turn, settled towards the rear, angled from the two path to the five path under urging on the far turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive and finished willingly for the show. SIGNATOR was hustled from the gate, went five then four wide on the first turn, settled off the pace, was roused late on the backstretch, traveled four then five wide under urging on the far turn, gained late on that bend, held a good striking position into upper stretch, remained on his inside lead until the furlong marker then swapped to the proper lead and flattened out. WINTERS LION was hustled from the gate, dropped from the two path to the rail on the first turn, settled off the pace, came under urging outside the half-mile pole, saved ground on the far turn, spun three wide into the stretch and failed to respond. NARCISO DALI went to the front, showed the way on the inside with company to his outside, lost the lead at the three-eighths pole, dropped back coming to the quarter-pole, drifted out while retreating near the furlong marker and capitulated. KIGALI broke a bit slow then was forced out, went three to four wide on the turns and was no factor. MIDNIGHT TROUBLE was hustled from the start, went five then four wide on the first turn, settled off the pace, came up empty while three to four wide on the far turn and retreated.

ENTRY.NAME: Narciso Dali
ENTRY.OWNER: Chichakly Amira Irwin Mark and Diamond William R
ENTRY.COMMENT: to front,inside pace,ins foe,headed3/8,drp back1/4,drift out,fade

ENTRY.NAME: Antares
ENTRY.OWNER: Mathiesen Mark Williams Latham Polger Lorne and Hall Barry
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3p1st,prompt outside,lead3/8,dueled stretch,drift out1/8,gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Askari
ENTRY.OWNER: Town and Country Racing LLC and Pollock Jr Sam B
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,ins1st,settled,angled 2-5w2nd turn,along for show

ENTRY.NAME: Kigali
ENTRY.COMMENT: off bit slow,forced out,3-4wide turns,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Winters Lion
ENTRY.COMMENT: hstld,correct right-rein,2p-ins1st,settld,ask1/2,ins2nd,3w,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Gilmore
ENTRY.OWNER: SF Racing LLC Starlight Racing Madaket Stables LLC Masterson Robert E Stonestree
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,4-5p1st,tracked outside,ask4p2nd,bid5/16,dueled,prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Signator
ENTRY.OWNER: West Point Thoroughbreds Woodford Racing LLC Gainesway Stable (Antony Beck) Phip
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,5-4p1st,settled,4-5w2nd,gain5/16,flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Trouble
ENTRY.OWNER: Paradise Farms Corp and Staudacher David
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,5-4p1st,settled,empty 3-4w2nd turn,retreated

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of GOO

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 91. Claiming Purse 36000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races In 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race In 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Du e At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRINTRACK coaxed from the gate, established the front and showed the way in hand just off the inside under some pressure from MONEY MIKE to the outside, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, continued just off the inside into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive kept to task. AIR SHOW chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, ran on to secure the place honors. SOUPER CATCH seven paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked four wide at the half mile pole before going three wide at the seven-sixteenths, had the rider flash the crop to the left side through the midway point on the turn, went four wide into upper stretch, tipped out a path being flashed a left handed crop once more and kicked on belatedly to secure the show honors. MONEY MIKE coaxed from the gate, prompted the pace from the outside four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch and was shaken off straightened away, then weakened in the late stages. WINNING DRIVE coaxed from the start, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals to the finish. DIGITAL FUTURE coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. GHOST GIANT coaxed from the gate, chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung five to six wide into upper stretch and weakened. NO MORE TALK chased six then five wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went seven wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. FIRST DEPUTY sluggish early, got coaxed along four then three wide at the tail of the field down the backstretch, tucked inside through the turn, went four wide into upper stretch and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Winning Drive
ENTRY.OWNER: Krakow Racing LLC SOK Racing and Politano James
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 7/16, 4w uppr, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Air Show
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 7/16, angled 4w upper, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Digital Future
ENTRY.OWNER: Greyhound Stables Dunn Christopher T Dark Horse Racing Stable Genovese Corrin an
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 5/16, ins 1/4, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: No More Talk
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 6-5w, coaxed 5/16, angled 7w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: First Deputy
ENTRY.OWNER: Iglesias Jesse Abdala III Albert P and Garcia Thomas
ENTRY.COMMENT: sluggish early, chased 4-3w, ins turn,4w uppr, trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Ghost Giant
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 5/16, 5-6w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Printrack
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 2p, coaxed near 1/4, 2w 1/4p, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Souper Catch
ENTRY.COMMENT: 7w backstretch, 4-3w turn, left hand crop 3/8, 4w uppr, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Money Mike
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, prompted 4-3w, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, wknd late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 7 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 92. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Ste wards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile and One Eighth on the Main Track). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHE'S MO BUBBLY angled in while hustled to the front, went around the first turn in the two path, showed the way down the backstretch, extended the advantage while dropping from the two path to the inside on the final turn, responded well when roused outside the quarter-pole, drew off under the crop into the final furlong, widened while kept to the task into the final sixteenth then was eased up while much the best. PARIS STYLE (FR) broke in then was coaxed into the first turn, dropped from the five path to the three path on that bend, settled towards the front, made her way to the rail near the nine-sixteenths, chased while moving from the inside to the two path on the far turn, pursued the winner under a drive into upper stretch and proved no match while clear for the place. MACHIAVELLIQUE went around the opening bend in the two path, settled under coaxing, was ridden along in the two to three path early on the far turn, shifted four wide later on that bend, turned into upper stretch under a drive and lacked the needed response while best of the rest. TACITURN was off a bit slow, went around the first turn in the two path, lagged near the back, traveled around the far turn in the two path, was taken in hand while off heels at the top of the stretch and failed to threaten. KATIE'S CHECKRIDE raced in the three path on the first turn, stalked the pace on the outside of the leader, chased in the three path on the far turn, dropped to the two path coming to the quarter-pole and tired. SPELL ON YOU was carried in at the start then bumped with a foe, went four wide on the first turn, was forwardly placed on the outside, dropped back outside the half-mile pole, came up empty while four then five wide on the far turn and retreated. ABSOLUTE CONTROL (FR) became very fractious behind the gate and reared up backward unseating the rider, ran loose for about three-sixteenths of a mile before being nabbed by an outrider, was finally pulled up by the outrider after going around three furlongs from the gate, remained without weight in the saddle while the other foes continued to have the riders aboard, was brought back to the gate after a few minutes then deemed fit to run by the state veterinarian, was a bit recalcitrant while loading then was fractious in the gate, threw her head and ducked in at the start then was checked, spotted the front several lengths, shifted from the two to the three path early on the first turn, lagged at the rear, went three then four wide on the far turn and was no factor. SHE WILL DANCE (IRE) was hustled from the gate, settled on the inside, was through after going five furlongs and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Absolute Control (FR)

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of LYP

ENTRY.COMMENT: unseat jock,loose for 3/16,pull up after3/8,dck in st,chckd,empty

ENTRY.NAME: She Will Dance (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,settled inside,urged along 1/2,empty,retreated,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Machiavellique
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,settled under coaxing,2-4p2nd turn,best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Taciturn
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow,2p1st,well back,2p2nd,off heels 1/4,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: She's Mo Bubbly
ENTRY.OWNER: Low, Lawana L. and Robert E.
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled to front,2p1st,pace,2p-ins2nd,drew off,eased up last1/16

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Southern Equine Stables, LLC & SouthernEquestrian Stables,

ENTRY.NAME: Katie's Checkride
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3p1st,stalked,chased 3p2nd turn,drop back 5/16,2p1/4,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Spell On You
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried in brk,bmpd,4w1st,up close,out,empty 4-5w2nd,retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Paris Style (FR)
ENTRY.OWNER: Walking L Thoroughbreds LLC and Three Chimneys Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,5-3p1st,settled,rail4-1/2,ins-2p2nd turn,chased,no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 94. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 156000. (PURSE $120,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $27,144 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Afte rcare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OLGA ISABEL established the front seven furlongs from home while just off the inside before showing the way in hand three to four paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked to the two path half a mile from home, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and floated three wide into upper stretch, drew off under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in and held safe to prevail. TOUGH STREET chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the far turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, closed well to the finish just latching on the top one as she hit the wire. SHEZZ KOLDAZICE broke out at the start, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch and improved position to secure the show honors. PRETTI XTREME chased four to five wide down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the far turn coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung five wide for home and weakened. SIGNAL FROM NOISE bobbled at the break, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, tired. TIZZY IN THE SKY four then three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, tired. LEAVE NO TRACE lunged at the start and was away last and awkward, chased five then four wide growing eager into the backstretch and pulling his way to be just off the pace, went four wide into the far turn and came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, faded and went five wide into upper stretch, faltered and was eased home to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Shezz Koldazice
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased ins, coaxed 7/16, 3w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Tough Street
ENTRY.OWNER: Caruso Michael J and Dubb Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 5/16, angled 4w upper, closed well

ENTRY.NAME: Signal From Noise
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, ins 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Leave No Trace
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunged st, 5-4w pursuit, coaxed 7/16, 5w upper, faltered, eased

ENTRY.NAME: Olga Isabel
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 3-4w, to 2p 1/2, 3w upper, drew off, held safe

ENTRY.NAME: Tizzy in the Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 7/16, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Pretti Xtreme
ENTRY.OWNER: Zilla Racing Stables Black Jack Racing LLC and Acqua Nova Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-5w pursuit, coaxed 3w 7/16, 5w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: P. G. Johnson S. SARATOGA RACE 9 1M Dirt CR: 86. Stakes Purse 150000. INNER TURF FOR FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Non-Lasix race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $150 each which should accompany the nomination; $750 to pass the entry box and an additional $750 to st art. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $750 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to four th, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight 122 lbs. Non-winners of a race on the turf other than claiming allowed 2 lbs.; maidens allowed 4 lbs. A presentation will be made to the winning owner. The New York Racing Asso ciation reserves the right to transfer this race to the Main Track. Closed Saturday, August 19, 2023 with 22 Original Nominations and 1 Supplement. (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGIC CROSS went to the front, showed the way on the inside, was urged along on the far turn, spun four wide into the stretch under pressure, battled inside of the runner-up into the final furlong, disposed of that foe under a right-handed crop shortly thereafter and drew away under steady handling. TAKEMETOTHEBEACH went five then four wide on the first turn, moved up in hand with six furlongs to run then prompted the pace on the outside, drew even with the leader in the two path on the far turn, was carried five wide into the stretch, battled outside the winner under a drive into the final furlong and proved no match while clear for the place. DANCING SPIRIT went three wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, was given her cue in the three path on the far turn, floated seven wide into the stretch, pursued the top two under a drive into the final furlong and came up empty. VILLI OLENTO was away alertly, prompted the leader in the two path on the first turn, dropped back inside the three-quarter pole, was roused outside the half-mile pole, came up empty while inside to the two path on the far turn and faltered then was eased but walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Magic Cross
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside pace,urged 2nd turn,4p1/4,shook foe ins1/8,drew away

ENTRY.NAME: Villi Olento
ENTRY.OWNER: Wachtel Stable and Pantofel Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: away fast,2p1st,drop back 5-1/2,empty 2p-ins2nd,falter,easd,wlkd

ENTRY.NAME: Dancing Spirit
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w1st,settled outside,ask3w2nd turn,floated 7w1/4,came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: Takemetothebeach
ENTRY.OWNER: Kintz S Matthew and Fisher James
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-4p1st,mvd up3/4,prompt outside,vied 2p2nd,5p1/4,no match

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of ASC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 10 1M Dirt CR: 75. Maiden Claiming Purse 50000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be V oid). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNCLE MARTY broke out at the start and was corrected, raced briefly four wide before heading six paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked four wide through the far turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong out, dug in dueling through the stretch to the finish and gamely prevailed inching away at the end. ATLANTA'S ACUNA dueled four wide with PERFECT OUTCOME to his inside, tucked to the two path into the far turn steadily shaking off his main pace foe coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under challenge from the aforementioned foe and dueled through the stretch with that rival fighting on gamely but was ultimately shaken off late while well clear of the rest and along second best. SILENT RUNNING tossed his head at the start when away awkwardly forcing the rider into the bit against his mouth, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun two to three wide into upper stretch and was along clear and best of the rest for the show honors. UTAMARO chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened. MUNNY FOR NUTHIN coaxed from the start, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch and weakened. I'M JUST broke out at the start, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch and tired. MYLES five paths off the inside early on, came under coaxing tucked three wide at the seven-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and tired. PERFECT OUTCOME dueled from the two path with ATLANTA'S ACUNA to the outside, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and tired. SOCIAL SIDEKICK chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, tired and was eased home through to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Social Sidekick
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 7/16, 2w 1/4p, tired, eased home

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Outcome
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2p, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, tired
